name: Cutting Room Floor
description:
I pay a fortune to get the job done! What do I get? A steaming pile of café art school crap!

That idiot director would rather hug friends and read a napkin speech in front of the world than buy a fifth car. So I fired the fool. Get on the CUTTING ROOM FLOOR!!!

Salvage my MONEY!! my MOVIE! NOW!!!

---

Cutting Room Floor is a game where you make the final cut! The producer has given you the responsibility to make decisions. Pick your scenes, choose their order, choose a soundtrack and ship this movie out!
